About Me

Hi, I'm Hansheng Liu, a Master of Computer Science student at University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign. My background combines Computer Science and Mathematics. My research is in throretical computer science, with a particular emphasis on graph algorithms. I also have experience in industry applications, especially software development.
